import './App.css'; import { useState } from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; var cloudinary = require("cloudinary").v2; cloudinary.config({ cloud_name: 'yourusername', api_key: 'YOUR-KEY', api_secret: 'YOUR_SECRET' }); function Verify() { const [address, setAddress] = useState("") const [name, setName] = useState("") const [nic, setNIC] = useState("") const [nicfront, setNICFront] = useState("") const [nicback, setNICBack] = useState("") const [selfie, setSelfie] = useState("") const submitApplication = () => { console.log("start") Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/create', { address: address, name: name, nic: nic, nicfront: nicfront, nicback: nicback, selfie: selfie }).then(()=>{ console.log("Success") }); }; return ( <>
